movie.title: Flags of Our Fathers
movie.plot: There were five Marines and one Navy Corpsman photographed raising the U.S. flag on Mt. Suribachi by Joe Rosenthal on February 23, 1945. This is the story of three of the six surviving servicemen - John 'Doc' Bradley, Pvt. Rene Gagnon and Pvt. Ira Hayes - who fought in the battle to take Iwo Jima from the Japanese.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 25 nominations.

events.title: six soldiers raise the flag at Iwo Jima
